title: Rajasthan readies Private Land Pooling plan to woo renewable energy investors
description: Rajasthan is set to implement land reforms to enhance availability for new manufacturing units, as per state Principal Secretary (Industries) Ajitabh Sharma. The state has garnered investment commitments exceeding Rs 5.2 lakh crore, particularly in renewable energy, petrochemicals, and various other sectors. Plans include the Private Land Aggregation bill to facilitate industrial growth through private land pooling, with a focus on infrastructure development in remote regions.
